Forgive me if this sounds impossible, I am new at CSS. I want to make a
tag and give it a class of 'imagepanel1-2'. The point is to have 3 images in this panel: 1 large and 2 small (the 2 smalls would be stacked on each other just the right of the large one). And I want to be able to do this in the HTML:
In the CSS the 'large' and 'small' subclasses would control the widths and heights of the images, and the 'imagepanel1-2' would control the orientation. Also, there should be 1 pixel empty space between each image in the panel. Is what I am describing possible?
